text: @hitRECordJoe I hate to ask questions I'm sure I can "search" the info for someplace, but asking here and getting an answer feels less automatized: what do *you* do with the results of these prompts that you post about? I mean... there's a large system, obviously, but... best case scenario?

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Actor
domain.description: An actor or actress in the world, like Kate Winslet or Leonardo DiCaprio
